ygData.subject: Re: Bombastic Bellow [ was: Dueling?]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Funny you should mention this -- we are trying to figure the same thing out. Both times we have done an 8+ hour camp back there, we have never seen her
ygData.messageBody:
> Just a quick off topic question: Did you see DS
> respawn at all in the 8 hours you were there?
> I've heard rumors that she has random chance of
> respawning every 2 hours.. also that she's on an
> 8, 12, 24, 72 hour timer. (I know 72 isn't the
> case, but I've heard that rumor :b)
>
Funny you should mention this -- we are trying to figure the same
thing out. Both times we have done an 8+ hour camp back there, we
have never seen her respawn. Actually, I think you have a better
chance of everyone walking out with new Druid boots, than to see a
second Dru.


> Back on topic: Did your raid let you split her
> room with Lull?
No. Luckily, Dragon's Claw is blessed with some of the best (if not
the best with Shaquil) pullers on the server. We have always split
this room with our monks.

> Grats again on 55. :)
Thank you! *Smiles*

Gaelthorne
Xegony
